name: Open source code from Dr Paul Brewer and Economic & Financial Technology Consulting LLC
body:
## Welcome

This page exists to help people looking for open source software find what they need from me, quickly, and understand how the various libraries are related. 

## Economics 

### Agent-based Simulation of Market Exchange Trading and Scenarios from Microeconomics

These projects are libraries that can be assembled to form an agent-based market simulator with robot traders.  

* [market-engine](http://npmjs.com/package/market-engine)
* [market-example-contingent](http://npmjs.com/package/market-example-contingent)
* [market-agents](http://npmjs.com/package/market-agents) 

An example simulator, supporting one market, built atop this code is at:

* [single-market-robot-simulator](http://npmjs.com/package/single-market-robot-simulator)

With plugins for additional functionality:

* [single-market-robot-simulator-viz-plotly](http://npmjs.com/single-market-robot-simulator-viz-plotly)
* [single-market-robot-simulator-savezip](http://npmjs.com/single-market-robot-simulator-savezip)

A web front end is at

* [robot-trading-webapp](http://github.com/DrPaulBrewer/robot-trading-webapp)

which provides the example simulator app at http://drpaulbrewer.github.io/robot-trading-webapp

### Game Theory Matrix-Game Prototype in MeteorJS for Human Subject Experiments

* [meteor-matrixgame](http://github.com/DrPaulBrewer/meteor-matrixgame)  

###HAMP Loan Modification

* [Unofficial-Loan-Modification-HAMP](http://github.com/Unofficial-Loan-Modification-HAMP) Early version of unofficial HAMP Calculator code for https://www.armdisarm.com

* [loan-modification-politics](http://github.com/loan-modification-politics) Correlation of HAMP Loan Application Outcomes and the 2008 Presidential Vote

supporting data for [blog article on HAMP Approval Rate Analysis with Google Big Query at http://sunshineonacloudy.net/](http://blog.sunshineonacloudy.net/2015/03/loanmodificationapprovalrates_25.html)

## Miscellaneous

###Javascript NPM Libraries
* [stepify-plotly](http://npmjs.com/package/stepify-plotly) Makes step charts on Plotly from line charts by scanning traces for `.steps:1`
* [cumulative-distribution-function](http://npmjs.com/package/cumulative-distribution-function) Creates empirical cumulative distribution function from point data
* [positive-number-array](http://npmjs.com/package/positive-number-array) Returns an array of positive numbers from string or array input
* [transpluck](http://npmjs.com/package/transpluck) Transposes CSV-like data to collection of columns and plucks desired data columns
* [csv-file-creator](http://npmjs.com/package/csv-file-creator) Creates a .csv file on the browser from array-of-array data.
* [find-zero-range](http://npmjs.com/find-zero-range) Finds a line segment where a step function is zero, by bisection.
* [partial-index](http://npmjs.com/partial-index) Partial sorting of muti-property data

###Prototypes

* [multicoresql](http://github.com/DrPaulBrewer/multicoresql) 

Sharding of sqlite database and multi core processing of sqlite queries across collections of sqlite shards.

###Examples/Utilities/Forks

* docker-stacks

Private fork of Jupyter project docker stacks to enable and test some disabled functionality.

* [nginx-reverse-proxy](http://github.com/DrPaulBrewer/nginx-reverse-proxy)

Quick setup of nginx web server in reverse proxy mode for proxying an app.
Also provides an example of autodeployment of a Docker container to Dockerhub

* [json-editor-customization-textarea-as-positive-number-array](http://github.com/json-editor-customization-textarea-as-positive-number-array)

Modifying JDorn's json-editor to use a textarea to prompt for a list of positive numbers

## Amateur-Radio Hobbyist code

* [satchat](http://github.com/DrPaulBrewer/satchat) Ham Radio and Weather Satellite tracker with chat room in MeteorJS runs at http://beta.satchat.net
* [cqwx](http://github.com/DrPaulBrewer/cqwx) NOAA APT Weather Satellite signal decoder written in python
* [rtlsdr-automated-wxsat-capture](http://github.com/DrPaulBrewer/rtlsdr-automated-wxsat-capture) Automation for recording and processing signals from an RTLSDR device in Linux
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
